information.description: wut in TORNATION are you fuckin city slickers doin on my profile? Jesus christ turned me into a fuckin sko wolf because i ain't been dippin no sko this week, but i still love to GIT R DUN!!!

greetings:
Hello, welcome to Flabby's, may I take your order?

If I were you, I would take number 4, the Jumbo Slappy Shitburger. It comes with extra mayonnaise.

Hello, welcome to Flabby's, may I take your order?

Just a forewarning, we may spit in your food every once in a while.

Hello, welcome to Flabby's, may I take your order?

As company policy, I'm required to tell you up front that our doughnuts are made from cow feces.

Hello, welcome to Flabby's, may I take your order?

Maybe you can enjoy our 2-Ton Mega Glug drink. It comes free with a purchase of 50 Anusburgers.

Hello, welcome to Flabby's, may I take your order?
